DJ Controller with Performance Pads

Dec 19, 2013 â€¢ admin

As a DJ professional, you are looking for an exclusively designed DJ controller that achieve your original performance by mixing multiple tracks, then ddj-sx is the right choice for you. The Pioneer DDJ-SX DJ controller Black Serato Pro controller has wide range of I/O connections and inexpensive as well. The DJ software is easily controlled 4-channel mixer and mic inputs that help tactile approach to mixing digital music and deliver a dynamic DJ performance.
